Name: PROJECT MAZE
About the game: Challenge yourself and beat the maze. Play a maze through a unique ID or your own. Features: Two game modes where every run is unique: Free Run and Time Limited. Custom mode: Where you can set own MazeID and repeat a maze as much as you'd like. Multiplayer: Play a maze with up to four friends.

Meta Description: Looking for information on PROJECT MAZE? Check out the release date (May 28, 2018), developer insights from Lambdadev, and a complete game summary.
